data.comment: The match has started at Luigi Ferraris.
Sampdoria's Antonio La Gumina gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Crotone defender.
In the minute 2, Crotone will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sampdoria.
Throw-in Sampdoria.
Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, Alex Ferrari is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Claudio Ranieri (Sampdoria) is making a first change, with Morten Thorsby replacing the possibly injured Alex Ferrari.
In the minute 9, Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in the half of Crotone.
Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crotone's half?
In the minute 11, Crotone needs to be cautious. Sampdoria have an attacking throw-in.
Crotone have a goal kick.
Free kick Sampdoria.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
In Genoa Crotone attack through Jacopo Petriccione. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
In the minute 16, Gianluca Manganiello awards the away team a throw-in.
Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Goal kick for Crotone at Luigi Ferraris.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 22, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gianluca Manganiello awards the away team a throw-in.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sampdoria close to the penalty box.
In the minute 23, Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
Sampdoria drives forward and Valerio Verre gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 26, Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mikkel Damsgaard puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Great play from Jakub Jankto to set up the goal.
In the minute 29, Gianluca Manganiello awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
Crotone are in shooting range from this free kick.
At Luigi Ferraris, Omar Colley has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 32, Throw-in Sampdoria.
Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
Throw-in for Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 34, Attention is being given to Crotoneâ€™s Junior Messias and play has been suspended briefly.
Junior Messias for Crotone is back on the field again.
In the minute 36, Sampdoria have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal! Sampdoria extend their lead to 2-0 through Jakub Jankto.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
In the minute 39, Gianluca Manganiello signals a throw-in for Crotone, close to Sampdoria's area.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Ball safe as Crotone is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Crotone have been given a penalty at Luigi Ferraris...
At Luigi Ferraris the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Sampdoria in the half of Crotone.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 45, Goal! Simeon Nwankwo nets a penalty for Crotone. They now trail 2-1.
Junior Messias for Crotone has been booked by Gianluca Manganiello and receives a first yellow card.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Sampdoria capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crotone's half?
Giovanni Stroppa is making the team's first substitution at Luigi Ferraris with Milos Vulic replacing Salvatore Molina.
Free kick in a good position for Sampdoria!
In the minute 48, Sampdoria push upfield but Gianluca Manganiello quickly pulls them for offside.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Sampdoria's Albin Ekdal has been booked in Genoa.
In the minute 51, Sampdoria to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
Throw-in for Sampdoria close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
In the minute 53, Valerio Verre (Sampdoria) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sampdoria push forward at Luigi Ferraris and Antonio La Gumina gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Crotone defence.
Throw-in high up the field for Sampdoria in Genoa.
In the minute 56, Gianluca Manganiello awards the away team a throw-in.
Gianluca Manganiello waits before resuming play because Jakub Jankto for Sampdoria is still down.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
In the minute 58, Jakub Jankto is back on his feet again.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Sampdoria.
Luca Marrone is booked for the away team.
In the minute 60, Fabio Quagliarella is replacing Antonio La Gumina for the home team.
Crotone needs to be cautious. Sampdoria have an attacking throw-in.
The home team replace Valerio Verre with Gaston Ramirez.
In the minute 62, In Genoa Sampdoria's Morten Thorsby is caught offside.
Throw-in for Crotone in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
In the minute 65, Goal! Sampdoria extend their lead to 3-1 through Fabio Quagliarella.
Albin Ekdal instrumental with a fine assist.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a Crotone throw-in in Sampdoria's half.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Crotone close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Throw-in for Crotone in the half of Sampdoria.
Crotone make their second substitution with Emmanuel Riviere replacing Jacopo Petriccione.
In the minute 71, Crotone's Arkadiusz Reca gets in a shot on goal at Luigi Ferraris. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Crotone have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Mikkel Damsgaard returns to the field for Sampdoria after picking up a slight injury.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Mikkel Damsgaard for Sampdoria who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Crotone.
In the minute 75, Sampdoria's Gaston Ramirez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Crotone at Luigi Ferraris.
Gianluca Manganiello awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Koffi Djidji is replacing Lisandro Magallan for Crotone at Luigi Ferraris.
Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crotone's half?
In the minute 80, Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Sampdoria have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Throw-in Sampdoria.
Free kick Crotone.
Throw-in for Crotone at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 87, The away team have replaced Simeon Nwankwo with Luis Rojas. This is the fourth substitution made today by Giovanni Stroppa.
Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 89, Claudio Ranieri (Sampdoria) is making a fourth substitution, with Antonio Candreva replacing Mikkel Damsgaard.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Antonio Candreva for the home team is judged to be offside.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a Crotone throw-in in Sampdoria's half.
Crotone's Sebastiano Luperto misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-1.
Maya Yoshida is replacing Adrien Silva for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
Fabio Quagliarella heads in to give Sampdoria a 4-1 lead at Luigi Ferraris.
Antonio Candreva instrumental with a fine assist.
